casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 3806. Second Appellate District, Division One. April 26, 1922.] IRA SMITH, Respondent, v. A. L. GORE et al., Appellants.

Schweitzer & Hutton for Appellants.

E. Burton Ceruti for Respondent.

THE

COURT.—[1]

This action is based upon facts identical with those involved in the ease of Prowd v. Gore, cmte, p. 458 [207 Pac. 490]. Upon the authority of what is there said, the judgment herein is affirmed.
